text:
Mayor Lori Lightfoot of Chicago apologized to a social worker who was handcuffed naked by police officers who burst into her apartment with a battering ram last year. They were looking for someone else.

text: Fast food workers in New York will soon have more job security: The City Council on Thursday approved a bill that protects them from being fired without a valid reason and allows them to appeal terminations through arbitration. https://t.co/1ZVwlxYP9j
